publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-396 Mr Keith Harding: North Lanarkshire Council—That the Parliament expresses its concern over moves by the ruling Labour administration on North Lanarkshire Council to extend its Special Responsibility Allowance (SRA) to a further six councillors, at a cost of £30,000 to local council tax payers; notes that almost eighty per cent of the of the administration’s fifty six members now receive SRAs, and condemns the actions of the Council’s Labour group for putting its own interests ahead of those of local residents and council tax payers.
